Paso 1: wordpress instalado

May 08, 2009 in Empiezo las andanzas en el mundo "blogueril" personal. Me llamo Fer, y en este blog intentaré transmitir lo mejor que pueda los conocimientos que he ido adquiriendo a lo largo de mi vida en el mundo del desarrollo de software (y un poquito de diseño también, pero poco, que no es lo mío). Como primer paso he conseguido un dominio, un servidor y la última versión de [wordpress 2.7.1][wordpress]. Poco a poco, iré implementando mi propio tema de wordpress. Para ello, parto de la base del tema [Carrington Jam][carrington], tema especialmente pensado para modificarlo a gusto del consumidor. Para realizar este tema, principalmente utilizaré el framework javascript [jQuery 1.3.2][jquery], mi favorito de entre todos los actuales. Falta algún plugin, publicidad para sobrellevar la crisis, añadir mi cuenta de twitter... Poco a poco iré actualizando. Bienvenidos :-) [wordpress]: http://wordpress.org/ "wordpress" [carrington]: http://carringtontheme.com/ "Carrington Jam" [jquery]: http://www.jquery.com/ "jQuery 1.3.2." Tags: wordpress  carrington  jquery

Who am I?

My name is Fernando Espinosa, a spanish guy passionate with web development and specialized in usability.

Where do I came from?

I have been developing software professionally for more than ten years. My career goes through companies like Soluziona or Indra amongst others. You can see my resume at Xing" title="Fernando Espinosa Jiménez"> or .

What do I do?

I develop web applications using agile methodologies and focusing on its usability. I do my best efforts creating clean, appealing and easy to use user interfaces. Without neglecting application features, of course.

How do I do it?

With the help of agile methodologies, prototyping since development starts and a fluent communication with the client, so I can respond his expectations and needs any time.

What tools do I use?

These are the ones which I feel more comfortable with:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • jQuery
  • HTML
  • CSS2 y CSS3
  • Mac OSX o Gentoo

But if the project requires it, I also manage Java and PHP (although I prefer avoiding them if possible ;-)).

About hiring me.

Do you need a freelance web developer and my profile has interested you? Tell me your needs and I’ll give you all details posible and a budget if needed.
